Summary: red oval appeared then faded away
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were 2 other sightings in New York on or around August 18th 2011
divs: Sighting Detailsi was sitting on my porch smoking a cigarette with my girlfriend when she spotted a red oval like object to the east of Manhattan and asked me what it was. i looked at the object and stated that it was a blimp over citi field because of the mets game just i finished explaining that it was a blimp we saw it fade away to just a little red light that completely disappeared. i being a skeptic i googled the mets schedule on my phone just to find out that they were not playing at all today. i continued to look at the sky and see the air traffic from laguardia airport in the distance but still saw nothing even with clear skys to the east and thunder and lightning to the west still illuminating the sky.
